sentences.sContent: Everyone was very concerned whether he would pull through or not.
sentences.sCn: 每个人都很关心他是否能恢复健康。

sentences.sContent: It is only our determination to fight that has pulled us through.
sentences.sCn: 是我们战斗的决心才使我们渡过了难关。

trans.tranCn: 使从(受伤)中活下来；渡过难关
trans.tranOther: If someone with a serious illness or someone in a very difficult situation pulls through, they recover
